name: Christopher_Knight_Home_Mayfield_Fabric_Dining_Chair_(Set_of_2)
reviews: deep chairs. wood is a lovely rich color that compliments our farm table.
description: The Mayfield dining chairs are perfect for any room in your home. These chairs are designed with a heavy emphasis on quality and attention to detail.
